item.title: 香港将任命前毕马威会计师事务所中国区主管唐嘉信为证券交易所主席
item.description: 香港政府计划任命毕马威会计师事务所（KPMG）中国区前主席唐嘉年（Carlson Tong）主持香港证券交易所的工作。【原文：The Hong Kong government plans to name Carlson Tong, the former chairman of KPMG China, to preside over the city’s stock exchange.】

item.title: 房地产风险促使 S&P 下调对韩国经纪公司的展望
item.description: 据 S&P 全球评级公司称，房地产市场投资可能会给韩国证券公司带来麻烦，该公司周五将两家公司的评级展望调整为负面。【原文：Real estate market investments may cause trouble for South Korean securities firms, according to S&P Global Ratings, which revised its ratings outlook to negative for two companies on Friday.】

item.title: 日本央行加息押注增加，日本大宗商品交易重现生机
item.description: 市场正在考虑日本央行最快将于本月退出世界上仅存的负利率机制并提高借贷成本的可能性。【原文：Markets are reckoning with the very real chance that the Bank of Japan will exit the world’s last remaining negative-rates regime and increase borrowing costs as soon as this month.】

item.title: 日经 225 指数面临 2022 年以来日元升值的最大风险
item.description: 根据一项衡量标准，日本股市已成为两年来对日元走势最敏感的股市，这增加了创纪录的股市涨势停滞不前的风险。【原文：Japanese stocks have become the most sensitive to yen moves in two years by one measure, increasing risks of the record equity rally stalling.】

item.title: 拆除路障后香港买家争相抢购房屋
item.description: Ray Yuen 等了几个月，希望有人能买下他在香港的房子，这样他就可以为家人换一套更大的房子。但几乎没有人出价，他收到的出价也低得离谱。【原文：Ray Yuen waited for months for someone to buy his Hong Kong home so he could upgrade to a bigger one for his family. But there were barely any offers, and the ones he received were ridiculously low.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储和欧洲央行正慢慢向降息靠拢。日本央行加息的赌注越来越大。中国正在审查银行的债券投资。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The Fed and ECB are slowly edging toward cutting rates. Bets are mounting on BOJ hikes. China is scrutinizing bond investments by banks. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 加拿大-美国 Keystone 输油管道短暂停工后，原油价格上涨
item.description: 将加拿大原油输送到美国的重要通道 Keystone 输油管道服务短暂暂停后，石油上涨。【原文：Oil rose after services were briefly suspended at the Keystone pipeline, a crucial conduit carrying Canadian crude to the US.】

item.title: 中石油称中国石油需求进入低增长时代
item.description: 中国最大的能源生产商表示，随着去碳化开始消耗化石燃料，中国的石油需求已进入低增长阶段。【原文：China’s oil demand has entered a low-growth phase as decarbonization starts to eat into consumption of fossil fuels, the country’s biggest energy producer said.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将追随美国股市涨势，因鲍威尔持乐观态度：市场综述
item.description: 周四，美国股市在各国央行的积极信号帮助下上涨，在就业数据将有助于确定美联储的前进方向之前，亚洲股市已做好了上涨的准备。【原文：Asian equities were primed for gains after US stocks rose Thursday in a rally helped along by positive signs from central banks and ahead of jobs data that will help identify the path forward for the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 穆迪将埃及借贷交易展望上调至正面
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将埃及的信用前景上调至正面，因为该国从国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）和双边贷款机构获得了新的资金。【原文：Egypt’s credit outlook was raised to positive by Moody’s Ratings as the nation unlocks fresh funding from the International Monetary Fund and bilateral lenders.】

item.title: 基斯通石油管道关闭，期货走高
item.description: TC Energy Corp 的 Keystone 输油管道将加拿大重质原油输送到美国中西部和墨西哥湾沿岸，该输油管道周四部分关闭，导致石油期货在结算后交易中走高。【原文：TC Energy Corp’s Keystone oil pipeline, which transports heavy Canadian crude to the US Midwest and Gulf Coast, partially shut Thursday, sending oil futures higher in post-settlement trading.】

item.title: S&P 指数失误引发摩根士丹利和 PNC 神秘波动
item.description: 在 S&P Global 出现罕见失误后，美国几家最大银行的股价最近几天出现了不同寻常的走势。【原文：Shares of some of the biggest US banks went on an unusual ride in recent days after a rare S&P Global blunder.】

item.title: 财报显示扭亏为盈，Gap 跳涨
item.description: Gap Inc. 公布的第四季度盈利超出预期，这表明这家历史悠久的服装零售商扭亏为盈的努力正在取得成效。【原文：Gap Inc. rose after reporting fourth-quarter earnings that exceeded expectations, a sign that efforts to turn the storied apparel retailer around are bearing fruit.】

item.title: 前科创板交易员的 SPAC 空头为科技对冲基金带来 22% 的收益
item.description: Sylebra Capital 是一家专注于科技领域的对冲基金，由前高富管理公司合伙人丹尼尔-吉布森（Daniel Gibson）创立，今年其主要策略的回报率为 22%，其中大约一半的收益来自于空头下注。【原文：Sylebra Capital, a tech-focused hedge fund founded by ex-Coatue Management partner Daniel Gibson, returned 22% for its main strategy this year, with roughly half of the gain coming from short wagers.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会推迟就比特币 ETF 现货期权交易做出决定
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会已经延长了就批准直接投资于比特币的交易所交易基金期权交易做出决定的时限。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission has extended the timeline for which it will make decision on approving the trading of options on exchange-traded funds that invest directly in Bitcoin.】

item.title: 美国小型企业即使债务负担沉重仍保持乐观
item.description: 美联储的一项最新调查显示，尽管债务负担加重和高借贷利率限制了小型企业获得新的信贷，但美国小型企业对2024年的前景依然乐观。【原文：Small businesses in the US remained upbeat in their outlook for 2024 despite elevated debt burdens and high borrowing rates that limited their access to new credit, a new Federal Reserve survey showed.】

item.title: 埃弗顿未来所有者 777 Partners 因资产转让面临诉讼
item.description: 试图收购埃弗顿俱乐部的投资经理正被一名债权人起诉，该债权人希望阻止该公司转让两家子公司，声称该交易旨在 "保护 "资产。【原文：The investment manager trying to buy Everton FC is being sued by a creditor who wants to stop the firm from transferring two subsidiaries, claiming that the transaction was designed to “shield” the assets.】

item.title: YPF 称出售石油可腾出 8 亿美元用于页岩油开采
item.description: 阿根廷最大的石油和天然气生产商、国营伊石油公司（YPF SA）表示，其剥离老化油田的全面计划将释放出数亿美元的资金，用于投资其在备受瞩目的瓦卡穆埃尔塔（Vaca Muerta）地层的页岩开采项目。【原文：Argentina’s biggest oil and gas producer, state-run YPF SA, said its sweeping plan to divest aging oil fields will free up hundreds of millions of dollars to invest in its shale push in the heralded Vaca Muerta formation.】

item.title: 美国家庭净资产因持有股票而在 2023 年创下新高
item.description: 由于投资者从股市飙升和房价上涨中获益，美国家庭财富去年创下历史新高。【原文：Household wealth in the US increased to a record last year as investors reaped the benefits of a surging stock market and higher home values.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率自二月初以来首次下降
item.description: 随着购房者进入房地产市场传统上最繁忙的季节，美国抵押贷款利率在五周以来首次下滑。【原文：US mortgage rates slipped for the first time in five weeks as buyers head into the traditionally busiest season for the housing market.】

item.title: 美国和英国空袭的胡塞武装是谁？
item.description: 以色列与巴勒斯坦伊斯兰组织哈马斯之间的战争吸引了也门的胡塞叛军，他们控制也门西北部已近十年。与哈马斯一样，胡塞叛军也敌视以色列，并得到伊朗的支持。叛军多次袭击红海的船只，扰乱了红海的交通，并试图用导弹和无人机袭击以色列。他们说，他们的目标是红海中与以色列有联系的船只，尽管与以色列没有直接联系的船只也遭到了袭击。【原文：The war between Israel and the Palestinian Islamist group Hamas has drawn in Yemen’s Houthi rebels, who have controlled northwestern Yemen for nearly a decade. Like Hamas, the Houthis are hostile to Israel and backed by Iran. The rebels have disrupted traffic in the Red Sea by repeatedly attacking ships there, and they’ve attempted to strike Israel with missiles and drones. They’ve said they’re targeting Israel-linked vessels in the Red Sea, though ships with no such direct connection have been】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔对定价激增的通胀影响持怀疑态度
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）反驳了定价激增将助长美国通胀的观点，称公司应该有制定价格的自由。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell pushed back on the idea that surge pricing will fuel US inflation, saying companies should have the freedom to set prices.】

item.title: 印度经济大幅增长推动非洲最大保险公司实现盈利
item.description: 印度大流行病后的经济反弹推动了非洲最大的保险公司 Sanlam Ltd. 的盈利增长。【原文：India’s post-pandemic economic rebound is fueling earnings growth in Sanlam Ltd., Africa’s biggest insurance company.】

item.title: 香港税收减免引发恒基兆业地产项目公寓热销
item.description: 恒基兆业地产有限公司（Henderson Land Development Co.【原文：Henderson Land Development Co.’s latest housing project has become a symbol of Hong Kong’s property sales rebound following government tax cuts.】

item.title: 象牙海岸可可中期产量减少，供应进一步受到威胁
item.description: 头号可可种植国象牙海岸预计其本季即将到来的收成将减少，这有可能进一步加深全球可可短缺，而全球可可短缺已使价格飙升至创纪录水平。【原文：Top cocoa grower Ivory Coast expects its upcoming harvest to shrink this season, threatening to further deepen a global shortfall that has sent prices soaring to a record.】

item.title: I Squared 校友 Thomas Lefebvre 创办 Tallvine Partners 公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，前 I Squared Capital 合伙人 Thomas Lefebvre 已成立 Tallvine Partners 公司，该公司致力于在北美中型市场基础设施领域下注。【原文：Former I Squared Capital partner Thomas Lefebvre has formed Tallvine Partners, a firm dedicated to making middle-market infrastructure bets in North America, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 监视：橡树的霍华德-马克斯认为公司仍在 "裸泳
item.description:
橡树庄园的传奇人物 说，压力就在眼前，因为  "潮水还没有退去"

。【原文：

Distress is on the horizon, the Oaktree legend says, because ‘the tide hasn’t gone out’

】

item.title: 纽约银行新老板希望它看起来更像其他地区性银行
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）的新领导人希望这家陷入困境的商业地产贷款公司看起来更像其他地区性银行。【原文：New York Community Bancorp’s new leader wants the beleaguered commercial real estate lender to look more like other regional banks.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲央行正密切关注商业地产
item.description: 2023 年 3 月 16 日星期四，在德国法兰克福举行的利率决议新闻发布会上，欧洲中央银行（ECB）副总裁路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）。欧洲央行继续按计划将利率上调半个百分点，但对随后可能采取的行动保持沉默，因为市场动荡令瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse Group AG）感到不安。摄影师：亚历克斯-克劳斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Luis de Guindos, vice president of the European Central Bank (ECB), at a rates decision news conference in Frankfurt, Germany, on Thursday, March 16, 2023. The European Central Bank went ahead with a planned half-point increase in interest rates but was silent on what may follow amid market turmoil that roiled Credit Suisse Group AG. Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg】

item.title: 据说阿布扎比将利用花旗、汇丰和 FAB 为阿提哈德航空首次公开募股牵线搭桥
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，ADQ 已为枢纽航空公司阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways PJSC）可能进行的首次公开募股挑选了包括花旗集团、汇丰控股有限公司和阿布扎比第一银行在内的顾问。【原文：ADQ has picked advisers including Citigroup Inc., HSBC Holdings Plc and First Abu Dhabi Bank for a potential initial public offering of hub carrier Etihad Airways PJSC, according to people familiar with the matter.】
